00013   unsigned int binLength(unsigned int num) {
00014     unsigned int len =1;
00015     while(num > 1) {
00016         num = (num>>1);
00017         len++;
00018     }
00019     return len;

00031   int toBin(unsigned int num, unsigned int binLen,  std::vector<bool>& numBin) {
00032     numBin = std::vector<bool>(binLen);
00033     for(unsigned int i=0;i<binLen;i++) {
00034       numBin[i]=0;
00035     }//end for
00036     unsigned int pos = binLen -1;
00037     while(num > 0) {
00038       numBin[pos] = (num%2);
00039       num = num/2;  
00040       pos--;
00041     }  //end while  
00042     return 1;
00043   }//end function
00044 
00045   unsigned int binToDec(unsigned int* numBin, unsigned int binLen) {
00046     unsigned int res = 0;
00047     for(unsigned int i = 0; i< binLen; i++) {
00048       res = (2*res) + numBin[i];
00049     }
00050     return res;
00051   }//end function

00054 bool isPowerOfTwo(unsigned int n) {
00055   return !(n & (n - 1)) && n;
00056 }

00058 // compute the next highest power of 2 of 32-bit v
00059 int getNextHighestPowerOfTwo(unsigned int n) {
00060   unsigned int v = n;
00061   v--;
00062   v |= v >> 1;
00063   v |= v >> 2;
00064   v |= v >> 4;
00065   v |= v >> 8;
00066   v |= v >> 16;
00067   v++;
00068   return v;
00069 }
00070 
00071 // compute the prev highest power of 2 of 32-bit v
00072 int getPrevHighestPowerOfTwo(unsigned int n) {
00073   unsigned int v = n;
00074   v--;
00075   v |= v >> 1;
00076   v |= v >> 2;
00077   v |= v >> 4;
00078   v |= v >> 8;
00079   v |= v >> 16;
00080   v++;
00081   return  v >> 1;
00082 }
